definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to develop rapidly after abrupt turn (idiom); dramatic change

sentences.english: His car then swerved up the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他的車突然一個急轉彎衝上了便道。

sentences.english: It's not just the brainteasers that will stump you.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅是能難住你的腦筋急轉彎。

sentences.english: That sharp bend is a death-trap for motorists.
sentences.chinese: 那個急轉彎是開汽車的人的死亡陷阱。

sentences.english: The driver found the sharp left turn very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 司機發現那個左急轉彎車子很難開。

sentences.english: Tan said since Li took over the magazine's management, its circulation had seen a sharp drop.
sentences.chinese: 譚楷說，自從李昶執掌了雜誌之後，發行量急轉直下。

sentences.english: You'll also want to avoid tight turns, so look for slow curves and straight paths.
sentences.chinese: 還要避免急轉彎，所以儘量尋找溫和的彎道和直道。

sentences.english: The road makes several abrupt turnings .
The credit crunch last year brought a reversal of fortune.
sentences.chinese: 但去年的信貸危機使得冰島命運急轉直下。

sentences.english: Here the river takes an abrupt bend to the west.
sentences.chinese: 這條河在這裏急轉向西流去。

sentences.english: Marks in the roadway seem to indicate that he skidded taking a sharp turn.
sentences.chinese: 從車道上的痕跡來看，他似乎在急轉彎時打滑了。

sentences.english: It could be a swerve from a steep and quiet stretch of road.
sentences.chinese: 它可以是一段坡度陡峭但安靜公路的急轉彎。

sentences.english: The driver had ample time to brake or swerve and avoid the woman.
sentences.chinese: 司機有足夠的時間剎車或急轉彎，來避開那個女人。

sentences.english: The Heavenly Famous Garden complex shows how quickly the market has run into a wall.
sentences.chinese: 天時名苑樓盤顯示了樓市是如何的急轉直下。

sentences.english: His car was swerved to avoid bumping against the roadblock.
sentences.chinese: 爲了避免撞上路障，他把車作了個急轉彎。

sentences.english: The road is full of many abrupt turns.
Then both groups took the brain-teaser test again.
sentences.chinese: 隨後這兩組學生要再做一次腦筋急轉彎測試。

definition: perfectly straight/straight as a ramrod/bolt upright
to soar/to rise high into the air
(not of regular commerce) to sell or dispose of (goods etc)/to get rid of/to unload
to surge up violently (of ocean, river, lake etc)/turbulent
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
